title: Shot in the dark: looking for this Crandall (No Cap PSA 3), just sold on eBay!
author: njdunkin1

posts.post_title: Shot in the dark: looking for this Crandall (No Cap PSA 3), just sold on eBay!
posts.post_content:
Good evening fellow Net54 members! I was discussing a deal with the seller for this card. While waiting a response, someone beat me to the purchase! I hope it was someone from here who sees this post. I would be willing to pay an additional 10% of the purchase price and shipping fees to buy the card. Without further ado, here is an image of the one I desire.
Thank you!
